celfmt -i src.cel -o out1.cel
! stderr .

# Run celfmt again on the output to verify idempotency
celfmt -i out1.cel -o out2.cel
! stderr .

# The two outputs should be identical
cmp out1.cel out2.cel

-- src.cel --
state.as(state,
	(
		// First comment line.
		// Second comment line.
		has(state.a) && state.b > 0
	) ?
		state.c
	:
		state.d
)
